name: CubeGun2D
description:
CubeGun2D - shooter that was made in Unity. Simple task: get out from building, but with enemy's and weapons and other things that i was doesn't made for. This is my first experince for made big projects. Thanks for everyone who wait this game, and yeah you can play it on browser but better plays on when you download the full game.

Android version gonna be soon, so say tuned!
